WRITING.TEXT: They considered themselves of Phoenician blood. Also, yes, the Phoenicians didn't call themselves Phoenicians, the word is actually of Greek origin and denotes that they made purple dyes.

WRITING.TITLE: Which ancient commander and/or army would you not want to go against in battle?
WRITING.TEXT: I know that there have been some brutal armies and commanders, like the ancient Assyrian and Babylonian armies, but what do you guys say?
Okay, cool. Thank you for answering my questions good sir
